title: LFT Top/Mid D2+ semi professional team
body:
good evening,
the team "The Tower" is actually searching for top lane und mid lane player. Our roster consists out of high diamond and master player.
We are playing in the second italian league and ESL Series B. Also we want to start the project PG Nationals Italy for Master League.

You have to speak beginner english and also be a teamplayer. Your elo at season 8 in solo duo must be Diamond 2 or higher.

If you want to perform as semi professional player and have the ambitions to improve as team and challenge the highest competitions, you are ready to try it.
Add me ingame: OHE savior 
or write me on discord: CubeGod #1530

thank you for listen to me
